docTitle.titlePart:
Development of Epitope-Blocking ELISA for Universal
Detection of Antibodies to Human H5N1 Influenza
Viruses

front.div:
Abstract
Background: Human infections with highly pathogenic H5N1 avian influenza viruses have generally been confirmed by
molecular amplification or culture-based methods. Serologic surveillance has potential advantages which have not been
realized because rapid and specific serologic tests to detect H5N1 infection are not widely available.
